channel.title: [Resolved]Programmable Elevators - keyboard shortcuts partially broken
channel.description:
After updating to v3.0.0 there seems to be an issue with the keyboard shortcuts for each floor. I used to be able to just open the CP and press, 1, 2, 3 etc for each floor and off it went. Now, I have to select within the CP, like edit the elevation, name or change speed, then the focus seems to be set and the shortcut starts working.
I've tried clearing the mod off and putting it back on, but still the same.

item.title: [Resolved]Programmable Elevators - keyboard shortcuts partially broken
item.dc:creator: @Lamargo Lamargo
item.description:
@Lamargo wrote:

It turns out that removing Satisfactory Helper has fixed this. It must be doing something with modal focus for keyboard shortcuts?

Read full topic
